duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluates and treats center patients in accordance with standards of care.
Assists in the coordination of patient services, including specialty referrals, hospital and SNF coordination, etc.
Acts as an active participant with the care team through daily huddles.
Completes all medical record documentation in a timely manner working with a quality-based coder.
Follows policy and protocol defined by Clinical Leadership.
Participates in potential growth opportunities for new or existing services within the Center.
Assures personal compliance with licensing, certification, and accrediting bodies.
Spends 100% of time clinically focused on direct patient care, inclusive of patient facing time and general administrative time as it relates to direct patient care.
Participates in the local primary care “on-call” program of CenterWell as needed.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of accredited MD or DO program of accredited university
